gurmukhi: ਕੋਟਨਿ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ਅਸਚਰਜ ਅਸਚਰਜਮੈ ਕੋਟਨਿ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ਬਿਸਮਾਦਿ ਬਿਸਮਾਦ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kotani Kotaani Asacharaj Asacharajamai , Kotani Kotaani Bisamaadi Bisamaad Hai ?
translation: Millions of astonishments are feeling astonished at the grandeur of a Guru-conscious person who has been able to achieve union of mind and Guru's words in the holy gathering. Millions of trances are feeling surprised and astonished.

gurmukhi: ਅਦਭੁਤ ਪਰਮਦਭੁਤ ਹੁੲਿ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ਕੋਟਿ ਗਦਗਦ ਹੋਤ ਕੋਟਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਨਾਦ ਹੈ
transliteration: Adabhout Paramadabhout Hui Kotaani Koti , Gadagad Hot Koti Anahad Naad Hai ?
translation: Millions of strangeness’s are feeling astonished. Millions of tunes are feeling pleasure and ecstasy listening to the unstruck melody of the word in the consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਕੋਟਨਿ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ੳੁਨਮਨੀ ਗਨੀ ਜਾਤ ਨਹੀ ਕੋਟਨਿ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ਕੋਟਿ ਸੁੰਨ ਮੰਡਲਾਦਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kotani Kotaani Ounamanee Ganee Jaat Nahee , Kotani Kotaani Koti Sounn Mandalaadi Hai ?
translation: Millions of states of knowledge become redundant before the ecstasy of the engrossment of the united state of the word and consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਅੰਤ ਕੈ ਅਨੰਤ ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਅਾਦਿ ਪਰਮਾਦਿ ਹੈ ॥੨੫੦॥
transliteration: Gurmukhi Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangi , Ant Kai Anant Prabhu Aadi Paramaadi Hai ?250?
translation: A Guru-oriented person practices union of Guru's blessed words in his consciousness in the company of saintly persons. He focuses his mind on the Lord who is infinite and sans beginning. (250)
